titleInfo.title: The critter he got from those Washington Horse Traders

mods.abstract: Editorial cartoon by Jack Knox showing a farmer attempting to plow his field with a comically undersized mule/horse. It is titled, "The Critter He Got From Those Washington Horse Traders." It is probably a commentary on the Agricultural Adjustment Administration.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
